alert.note: Alert for Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:23AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay, northwestern Otter Tail, northern Wilkin, southwestern Becker, northern Ransom, southern Cass, southeastern Barnes and northern Richland Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fingal to near Horace to near Wolverton. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Barnesville, Horace and Casselton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 34 and 76. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 313 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Clay; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
